channel.title: Femme Fatales
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Femme Fatales" - no +9 stamina per mission?

item.title: Re: Femme Fatales
item.content:encoded:
If you want to get Stamina back with the Rack, take The Rack, Yuri (1 or 2 doesn't matter), and Pinky Lvl 2 or Stalkergirl 2.

Yuri negates The Rack's penalty while Pinky 2/Stalkergirl 2 give +1 Stamina. It's a Girl Power team to boot!

item.title: Re: Femme Fatales
item.content:encoded:
it's not gain stamina..

+9 femme fatals
+1 Pinky2
+1 sand monument
-10 the rack
-10 per mission

-9..it means cost per mission is 9..not good enough..

item.title: Re: Femme Fatales
item.content:encoded:
Actually, Pinky Lvl. 2's ability gets you +1 stamina per mission, and the Femme Fatales bonus gets you +9 stamina per mission. That's 10 stamina per mission which essentially negates the Rack's -10 stamina per mission. It's as though you had no bonus or weakness at all. The sand demon monument would give you +1 bonus stamina, just like you would have with any other (non Stalkergirl/Pinky2) team.

If you got +9 stamina per mission without the racks weakness, then you could run missions infinitely, and actually with a stamina increase.

+9 femme fatals
+1 Pinky2
+1 sand monument
=
+11 stamina per mission, more than running missions actually costs. You'd gain stamina for running missions, which would make Sannin runs infinitely easy (or infinitely hard depending on how you're looking at it).

item.title: Re: Femme Fatales
item.content:encoded:
Lol ok this one is simple.

The Rack has a -10 stamina per mission right?

Ok so basically that team gets u back 9 of the xtra 10 you loose.

The Rack +4 Tai Strength but all missions cost 10 more Stamina

When your in a team you still get the individual ally pro's and con's.

Also, if you are in a village with the Sand Demon Monument or w/e you will effectively get 10 stamina back per mission. (With that team of course) so running missions with The Rack in your team means missions cost 20 stamina. But with pinky and the rack as a team you get 9 out of the 20 stamina used. But with the sand demon monument you get 10 back out of the 20. So missions cost 10 stamina out of it all. (If that makes sense)

item.title: Femme Fatales
item.content:encoded: i had femme fatales with Pinky Lvl. 2 and The Rack. however, when I took my B-level missions, I didn't get the added 9 stamina per mission. any idea why? thanks
